p.d: Cornered, Julien has fled to Lyon where Julie is living. The brother and sister make up for lost time in the empty house usually occupied by Michel, their father, who was away on holiday. But magic moments come at a price: is Julien really going to miss his son's departure? Directed by: Stephen Cafiero (season 3, France, 2019) Screenplay: Frédéric Rosset, Camille Rosset Cast: Sébastien Chassagne (Julien), Marie Kauffmann (Marie), Théo Fernandez (Jacques), Nathalie Cerda (Sylvie), Matilda Marty (Emma), Allison Chassagne (Julie), Charlie Nelson (Louis), Amel Charif (Sam), Julie Farenc-Deramond (Léa), Martin Judas (Dylan), Bruni Makaya (Yanis) Genre: comedy drama
